Annotation: manual syntactic annotation; manual annotation of entities from the accouting domain and relations definition, obligation, right
Description: This corpus consists of two legal documents: Accounting Act (563/1991 Coll., as amended) and Decree on Double-entry Accounting for undertakers (500/2002 Coll., as amended).#SEPThe corpus is available for download from LINDAT and online browsing through the treebank viewer PML-TQ and the concordancer KonText.
This is a subcorpus of the META-NORD Acquis Parallel Treebank.#SEPThe corpus is available for download and online browsing through INESS (CLARINO).
This corpus contains legal texts from 1814 to 1989, compiled year by year.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing on a dedicated webpage

Corpus: The English Sub-corpus of MULCOLD, Multilingual Parallel Corpus of Legal Texts
Description: This corpus, which is a subcorpus of MULCOLD (see also the Parallel corpora resource family) contains international conventions and treaties arranged.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing through the concordancer Korp (FIN-CLARIN Distribution).
This corpus contains selected texts from the Acquis Communautaire between the 1950s and today, translated to English.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from PORTULAN.
This is a subcorpus of the META-NORD Acquis Parallel Treebank.#SEPThe corpus is available for download and online browsing through INESS (CLARINO).

Corpus: The Finnish Sub-corpus of the JRC-Acquis Multilingual Parallel Corpus, Downloadable Version
Description: This is a legal subcorpus of the Helsinki Korp Version of the Finnish TreeBank 3.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing through the concordancer Korp (FIN-CLARIN distribution) and for download from the Finnish Language Bank.

This is a subcorpus of the META-NORD Acquis Parallel Treebank. The corpus is syntactically parsed using the FinnTreeBank 2 schema and is available for download and online browsing through INESS (CLARINO).

Corpus: IGC-Laws-21.05 (The Icelandic Gigaword Corpus: Law, bills and proposals)
Description: IGC-Laws is a part of the IGC-project (The Icelandic Gigaword Corpus; see also CLARIN reference corpora) that aims to collect as much as possible of Icelandic texts that can be published under an open or restricted license. IGC-Laws contains 1) the Icelandic laws, 2) explanatory reports and observations extracted from bills submitted to Althingi, and 3) parliamentary proposals and resolutions. The corpus comes in two formats. One contains the texts untokenized and untagged while the other has been tokenized, POS-tagged and lemmatized.
This corpus contains selected texts from the Acquis Communautaire between the 1950s and today, translated to Maltese.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from PORTULAN.
This is a subcorpus of the META-NORD Acquis Parallel Treebank.#SEPThe corpus is available for download and online browsing through INESS (CLARINO).
This corpus contains Norwegian translations of 5414 documents in Acquis Communautaire.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Norwegian Language Bank.

Corpus: Legal Documents from Norwegian Nynorsk Municipialities
Description: This corpus contains 50,000 legal documents and meeting kinutes collected with the web crawler Veidemann. Around 88.5 million words are in Nynork, while the rest are in Bokmal (Bokmål).#SEPThe corpus is available for download  from the Norwegian Language Bank.
